nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_833_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Natasha made herself stand out in the group interview by acting as the leader in her group.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_834_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: To be successful, you need a careful plan, good luck, help at the right time, and above all, hard work.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_835_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: They are not doing this to gain recognition or money; they are doing this for the sake of society.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_836_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It was actually what he said rather than what he did that made me sad.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_837_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Once my mother sets her mind on something, it will be very hard to stop her.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_838_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Years of research had set the stage for their success in their field.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_839_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Local people are used to the phenomenon, so they are not surprised at all.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_840_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Today at this meeting we are going to focus on the question of air pollution.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_841_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He never expected that his best friend would charge him with cheating in the exam.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_842_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: His parents were so strict with him in his studies that he had little time to participate in any activities outside of class.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_843_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I was interested to see the elephants stripping trees of leaves with their long trunks.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_844_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I had told you again and again to find a more suitable person for this position, but you simply wouldn't hear of it.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_845_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: A trained dog can act as a guide to a blind person.
